text: Athanasios Zafeiropoulos (born 12 February 1944) is a Greek wrestler. He competed in the men's freestyle flyweight at the 1964 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1944 births Category:Living people Category:Greek male sport wrestlers Category:Olympic wrestlers of Greece Category:Wrestlers at the 1964 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Athanasios Zafeiropoulos
